mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JL3B_NOTICE VALUES( JL3B_NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resi_no}, #{horsehead_sort}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE JL3B_NOTICE SET notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_wdate = SYSDATE WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
UPDATE JL3B_NOTICE SET notice_hits = notice_hits + 1 WHERE notice_no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM( SELECT * FROM JL3B_NOTICE ORDER BY notice_no DESC) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currentPage}-1)*10+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currentPage}*10
